title: POC Spike (Minimum Agent Loop)
summary: Proves the Codexa core by wiring the minimum agent chain (PM→Designer→Implementer→Tester) with logging, approvals and demo collateral.
rationale: Validates orchestration and audit hand-offs end-to-end before expanding scope.

context.scope_guidance: Enable a human to run, observe and judge the agent loop.
context.readiness_note: Streams marked CHANGE IMPACTED or PARTIAL must rerun before acceptance.

title: Discovery MVP
summary: Delivers a runnable discovery pipeline producing manifests, System Model Graph projections, understanding metrics and seeded change journeys.
rationale: Establishes Codexa’s automated discovery loop and governance data flow.

context.scope_guidance: Prioritise quick/deep discovery modes and first loop-plan/seed workflow.
context.readiness_note: Demo readiness once discovery runs populate manifests and human scope selection works.

title: Operating Model Integration
summary: Operationalises the CR004 operating model so every Codexa deployment resolves configuration lineage through .codexa/ scaffolding and inherits global defaults.
rationale: Unifies configuration and provenance handling across deployments with linting, control-plane bundle and telemetry validation.

context.scope_guidance: Deliver FR-42–FR-44 and related FR-01/02/06/32/38/39 updates; advanced registries out of scope.
context.readiness_note: Requires .codexa/ linting in CI, published defaults with hashes, successful config doctor tests and audit lineage records.
